Name: Kim Dang
Description: I'm passionate about building programs around human-centered design. I am an aspiring weightlifting competitor and Yelp Eliter

roles.title: Fullstack Software Engineer
roles.description: Allow users to report and see other reports of raids utilizing Google Places API. Enable notifications to be sent to users via SMS message when a raid is within a 10 mile radius utilizing Twilio API. Render a ranked list of immigration lawyers by user’s zip code utilizing Yelp Fusion's API. Translate data scraped from Immigration Defense Project’s NY Trend ICE Report onto a map to display each raid location and summary of each report. Manage user data and sessions securely using Firebase Authentication with Email and Google.

Projects.Name: MELT
Projects.Description: Provides users with a way to report and see other Immigrations and Customs Enforcement (ICE) raids on a map.
Projects.TechStack: Tech Stack: React, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB

Projects.Name: Real Estate Price Visualizer
Projects.Description: Affordability calculator that allows buyers to estimate their monthly mortgage payments for a given home.
Projects.TechStack: Tech Stack: React, CSS Modules, Node.js, Express.js, Webpack, MongoDB, AWS EC2, Docker, Jest/Enzyme

Projects.Name: Realtime Chat App
Projects.Description: Simple real-time chat application that will support custom usernames, sending messages, and join and leave rooms.
Projects.TechStack: Tech Stack: Socket.io, React, Node.js, Express.js

Education.Name: University of California, Davis
Education.Description: B.A. Communications and Minor in Computer Science

Experience.Name: Backend Engineer
Experience.Sentence1: - Horizontally web scaled a legacy code base using Nginx load-balancer across 4 AWS EC2 instances, achieving a latency of 16ms with a throughput of 2000 rps and 0% error rate.
Experience.Sentence2: - Reduced query times (< 10ms) via PostgreSQL optimization (indexing, query restructuring and config tuning).
Experience.Sentence3: - Performed load testings with Loader.io and New Relic to maintain quality microservice performance and mitigate system bottlenecks.

Experience.Name: Frontend Engineer
Experience.Sentence1: - Implemented a real estate pricing microservice using React.
Experience.Sentence2: - Architected an Express proxy server to handle routing for RESTful APIs.
Experience.Sentence3: - Utilized MongoDB to persist user data.
Experience.Sentence4: - Containerized microservice via Docker and deployed on AWS EC2 for easy reproducibility and share-ability.
Experience.Sentence5: - Improved page loading speed by 200% via compressing the bundle.js file from 2.2 MB to 177kb (92% compression).

Experience.Name: Chief of Technology
Experience.Sentence1: - Led a team of 3 in designing and launching the organization’s website with CSS and HTML.
Experience.Sentence2: - Structured and incorporated search engine optimization within the website, increasing site traffic by 300% within 2 weeks and search ranking by 200% during recruitment drive.
Experience.Sentence3: - Hosted resume building and introductory HTML/CSS workshops for the organization which resulted in 20+ students attendance.
